text: Angel is a fictional vampire that appears in the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and is the main character of the spin-off Angel. He was played by David Boreanaz. ==Fictional biography== Liam of Ireland was sired by a female vampire and became known as Angelus. He would later sire Spike and work alongside Drusilla and the Master. On 1898, he killed a Romani and a mystic placed a spell where she restored his soul, making him feel guilty. Now known as Angel, he moved to America and stayed at Sunnydale. ==Reception== As Angelus, he is considered one of the best Big Bads of Buffy the Vampire Slayer.
